forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
